assertPositive

public int assertPositive(int var,
                          int state)
Asserts var=state as true. If KB is unsatisfiable it will return KB_UNSATISFIABLE.

assertNegative

public int assertNegative(int var,
                          int state)
Asserts var!=state as true. If KB is unsatisfiable it will return KB_UNSATISFIABLE.
